"Great group of people to work with." "We received lot of compliments from friends and family." "I am a project manager of a high end custom home builder."

We highly recommend Mirage Pools. This was our 3rd custom pool and from start to finish the experience was incredible. Our team of Nick, Mason and  Bryce delivered every single day. Mason was exceptional at calling and letting us know what … More Response from the owner a month ago Thank you Danita Williams! Your project is beautiful and you’ve been a wonderful family to work with. Have a great time with your awesome backyard! Please reach out if you need help on anything in the future!

We are absolutely thrilled with our second pool built by Mirage Custom Pools! Being a repeat customer is the highest praise we can offer, and once again, they exceeded expectations. The entire construction process was a great experience, … More

Highly Recommend this company. From the start of the process, Chris was so helpful and patient as we navigated through figuring out what exactly we wanted. He took our vision and put the rendering together. From the start of the pool … More Response from the owner 7 months ago Thank you Billy! Your project is beautiful and going to provide great memories for your family! Thank you for trusting Mirage Custom Pools to build your project.
